com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.forms

Class AddNewSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.forms.AddNewSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class AddNewSensor
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    Dialog for adding new SensorPanel to AdapterPanel. Loads from predefined property files or inserted by user. Also verifies properties correctness and afterwards adds new SensorPanel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • listeners

        private void listeners()
        Assigns listeners to dialog buttons.

      • onOK

        private void onOK()
        Checks correctness of inserted information. If everything is correct, adds new SensorPanel to AdapterPanel given as constructor parameter.

        Shows errors:

        • PROPERTIES_NOT_FOUND if given properties file cannot be found

      • checkPropertiesFile

        private java.util.Properties checkPropertiesFile(java.io.InputStream input,
                                       java.lang.String fileName)
        Checks if loaded properties file is correct.

        Shows errors:

        • PROPERTIES_NAME - name property incorrect
        • PROPERTIES_BCOLOR - background color property incorrect
        • PROPERTIES_FCOLOR - text color property is incorrect
        • PROPERTIES_LCOLOR - lable text color property is incorrect
        • PROPERTIES_REFRESH_RATE - refresh rate property is incorrect
        • PROPERTIES_SIGNAL - signal property is incorrect
        • PROPERTIES_BATTERY - battery property is incorrect
        • PROPERTIES_PROTOCOL - protocol property is incorrect
        • PROPERTIES_MISSING - one or more properties missing
        • PROPERTIES_MISSING_WRONG - multiset properties incorrect
        • PROPERTIES_INTEGER - some properties are not in correct number format
        • PROPERTIES_LOAD - cannot load properties file
        • PROPERTIES_NOT_FOUND - cannot find properties file

        Parameters:
        input - input stream with properties file
        fileName - file name
        Returns:
        properties set created from file

      • onCancel

        Disposes frame
